briefTitle: Mobile Health App to Promote Participation of Black Women in Breast Cancer Clinical Trials
officialTitle: A User-centered Mobile Health App to Promote Participation of Black Women in Breast Cancer Clinical Trials - Clinical Trial mHealth Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Feasibility of Mobile Health Application (mHealth app)- subjects
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years or older
* English speaking
* Able and willing to participate to complete the survey.
* Have access to a mobile device or computer.
* Diagnosed with breast cancer.
* Identify as African American

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inability to read and speak English.
* Dementia altered mental status, or any psychiatric condition that would prohibit the understanding or rendering of informed consent.
